font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">厥田惟下下。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">第九。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">荆州，厥土惟涂泥，厥田惟下中。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">第八。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">荆河豫州，厥土惟壤，下土坟垆，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">高者壤，下者垆。垆，疏也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">厥田惟中上。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">第四。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">梁州，厥土青黎，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">色青黑，沃壤也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">厥田惟下上。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">第七。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">雍州，厥土惟黄壤，厥田惟上上。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">第一。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">九州之地，定垦者九百一十万八千二十顷。虞夏殷三代凡千馀载，其闲定垦，书册不存，无以详焉。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">周文王在岐，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">今扶风郡岐山县。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">用平土之法，以为治人之道，地著为本，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">地著谓安土。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">故建司马法：&ldquo;六尺为步，步百为亩，亩百为夫，夫三为屋，屋三为井，井十为通，通十为成，成十为终，终十为同，同方百里，同十为封，封十为畿，畿方千里。故丘有戎马一匹，牛三头，甸有戎马四匹，兵车一乘，牛十二头，甲士三人，步卒七十二人。一同百里，提封万井，戎马四百匹，车百乘，此卿大夫采地之大者，是谓百乘之家。一封三百六十六里，提封十万井，定出赋六万四千井，戎马四千匹，车千乘，此诸侯之大者，谓之千乘之国。天子之畿内，方千里，提封百万井，定出赋六十四万井，戎马四万匹，兵车万乘，戎卒七十二万人，故曰万乘之主。&rdquo;小司徒之职，&ldquo;乃均土地以稽其人民，而周知其数。上地家七人，可任也者家三人。中地家六人，可任也者二家五人。下地家五人，可任也者家二人。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">郑玄曰：&ldquo;均、平也。周犹遍也。一家男女七人以上，则授之以上地，所养者众也。男女五人以下，则授之以下地，所养者寡也。正以七人、六人、五人为率者，有夫有妇，然后为家，自二人以至于十为九等，七、六、五者为其中。可任，谓丁强任力役之事者，出老者一人，其馀男女强弱相半，其大数。&rdquo;</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">乃经土地，而井牧其田野。九夫为井，四井为邑，四邑为丘，四丘为甸，四甸为县，四县为都，以任地事而令贡赋，凡税敛之事。&rdquo;</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">此谓造都鄙也。采地制井田，异于乡遂，重立国，小司徒为经之。立其五沟五涂之界，其制似井之字，因取名焉。谓隰皋之地，九夫为牧，二牧而当一井。今造都鄙，授民田，有不易，有一易，有再易，通率二而当一，是之谓井牧。昔夏少康在虞，思有田一成，有众一旅。一旅之众而田一成，则井牧之法，先古然矣。九夫为井者，方一里，九夫所治之田也。四井为邑，方二里；四邑为丘，方四里；四丘为甸，甸方八里；旁加一里，则方十里，为一成。积百井九百夫，其中六十四井五百七十六夫出田税，三十六井三百二十四夫治洫。四甸为县，方二十里，四县为都，方四十里；四都方八十里，旁加十里，乃得方百里，为一同也。积万井九万夫，其四千九十六井三万六千八百六十四夫出田税，二千三百四井二万七百三十六夫治洫，三千六百井三万二千四百夫治浍，井田之法，备于一同。今止于都者，采地食者，皆四之一。其制三等，百里之国凡四都，一都之田税入于王。五十里之国凡四县，一县之田税入于王。二十五里之国凡四甸，一甸之田税入于王。地事谓农牧衡虞也，贡谓九谷山泽之材也，赋谓出车徒给徭役也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">任土之法，以物地事，授地职，而待其政令。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">任土者，任其力势所能生育，且以制贡赋也。物，物色之，以知其所宜之事而授农牧衡虞，使职之。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">以廛里任国中之地，以场圃任园地，以宅田、士田、贾田任近郊之地，以官田、牛田、赏田、牧田任远郊之地，以公邑之田任甸地，以家邑之田任稍地，以小都之田任县地，以大都之田任疆地。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">谓廛里者，若今云邑居里矣。廛，民居之区域也。里，居也。圃树果蓏之属，季秋于中为场。樊圃谓之园。宅田者，致仕之家所受之田也。士相见礼曰：&ldquo;宅者在邦，则曰市井之臣；在野，则曰草茅之臣。&rdquo;士读为仕，仕者亦受田，所谓圭田也。孟子曰：&ldquo;自卿以下，必有圭田，圭田五十亩。&rdquo;贾田，在市贾人其家所受田也。官田，庶人在官者其家所受田也。牛田，牧田，畜牧者之家所受田也。赏田者，赏赐之田。公邑谓六遂馀地，天子使大夫治之，自此以外皆然。家邑，大夫之采地；小都，卿之采地；大都，公之采地，王子弟所食邑也。疆五百里，王畿界也。皆言任者，地之形实不方平如图，受田邑者远近不得尽如制，其所生育职贡，取正于是耳。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">民受田，上田夫百亩，中田夫二百亩，下田夫三百亩。岁耕种者为不易上田，休一岁者为一易中田，休二岁者为再易下田，三岁更耕之，自爰其处。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">爰，于也。更谓三岁即改与别家佃，以均厚薄。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">农民户人已受田，其家众男为馀夫，亦以口受田如比。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">比，例也。必寐反。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">士工商家受田，五口乃当农夫一人。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">口二十亩。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">此谓平土可以为法者也。若山林薮泽原陵淳卤之地，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">淳，尽也，泽卤之田不生谷。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">各以肥硗多少为差。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">硗，硗确，谓瘠薄之田。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">民年二十受田，六十归田。七十以上，上所养也；十岁以下，上所长也；十一以上，上所强也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">勉强劝之，令习事。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孟子曰：&ldquo;夫仁政必自经界始。经界不正，井地不均，谷禄不平，是故暴君污吏必慢其经界。经界既正，分田制禄可坐而定也。&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">秦孝公任商鞅，鞅以三晋地狭人贫，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">三晋，韩赵魏三卿，今河东道之地。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">秦地广人寡，故草不尽垦，地利不尽出。于是诱三晋之人，利其田宅，复三代无知兵事，而务本于内，而使秦人应敌于外。故废井田，制阡陌，任其所耕，不限多少。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝公十二年之制。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">数年之闲，国富兵强，天下无敌。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">汉孝文时，民近战国，皆多背本趋末。贾谊说上曰：&ldquo;古之治天下，至孅至悉，故其畜积足恃。今背本而趋末，游食者甚众，是天下之大残也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">本，农桑也。末，工商也。言人已弃农而务工商矣，其食米粟者又甚众也。残谓伤害。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">汉之为汉，几四十年矣，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">几，近也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">公私之积，犹可哀痛。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">言年载已多，而无储积。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">即不幸有方二三千里之旱，国胡以相恤？卒然边境有急，数十万之众，国胡以馈之？兵旱相乘，天下大屈。今驱人而归之农，皆著于本，使天下各食其力，末伎游食之民转而缘南亩，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">言皆趋农作。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">则畜积足而人乐其所矣。&rdquo;帝感谊言，始开籍田，躬耕以劝百姓。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">诏曰：&ldquo;夫度田非益寡，而计民未加益，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">度谓量计。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">以口量地，其于古犹有馀，而食之甚不足者，其咎安在？无乃百姓之从事于末以害农者蕃，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">蕃，多也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">为酒醪以靡谷者多，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">靡，散也。靡读曰縻。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">六畜之食焉者众与？细大之义，吾未能得其中。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">竹仲反。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">其与丞相列侯吏二千石博士议之，有可以佐百姓者，率意远思，无有所隐也。&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">晁错复说上曰：&ldquo;圣王在上而民不冻饥者，非能耕而食之，织而衣之，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">食读曰嗣。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">为开其资财之道也。故尧禹有九年之水，汤有七年之旱，而国亡捐瘠者，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">捐，谓人饥相弃捐也。瘠，瘦病也。言无相弃捐而瘦病者。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">以畜积多而备先具也。今海内为一，土地人民之众不避汤、禹，加以亡天灾数年之水旱，而畜积未及者，何也？地有遗利，民有馀力，生谷之土未尽垦，山泽之利未尽出也，游食之民未尽归农也。民贫则奸邪生，贫生于不足，不足生于不农，不农则不地著，不地著则离乡轻家。民如鸟兽，虽有高城深池，严法重刑，犹不能禁也。夫寒之于衣，不待轻暖；</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">苟御风霜，不求靡丽。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">饥之于食，不待甘旨；</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">旨，美也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">饥寒至身，不顾廉耻。夫腹饥不得食，肤寒不得衣，虽慈父不能保其子，君安能以有其民哉！明主知其然也，故务民于农桑，薄赋敛，广畜积，以实仓廪，备水旱，故民可得而有也。是故明君贵五谷而贱金玉。今农夫五口之家，其服役者不下二人，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">服，事也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">其能耕者不过百亩，百亩之收不过百石。春耕夏耘，秋获冬藏，伐薪樵，治官府，给徭役。春不得避风尘，夏不得避暑热，秋不得避阴雨，冬不得避寒冻，四时之闲亡日休息。又私自送往迎来，吊死问疾，养孤长幼在其中。勤苦如此，尚复被水旱之灾，急政暴赋，赋敛不时，朝令而暮改。当具有者半价而卖，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">本直千钱者，价得五百。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">亡者取倍称之息，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">取一偿二为倍称。称，举也。今俗所谓举钱。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">于是有卖田宅、鬻子孙以偿责者矣。方今之务，莫若使民务农而已矣。欲民务农，在于贵粟；贵粟之道，在于使民以粟为赏罚。&rdquo;帝从之。其后务敦农本，仓廪充实。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝景元年，制曰：&ldquo;闲者岁比不登，民多乏食，夭绝天年，朕甚痛之。郡国或硗骥，无所农桑系畜；或地饶广，荐草莽，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">草稠曰荐，草深曰莽。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">水泉利，而不得徙。其议民欲徙宽大地者，听之。&rdquo;后元三年，诏曰：&ldquo;农，天下之本也。黄金珠玉，饥不可食，寒不可衣，以为币用，不识其终始。闲岁或不登，意为末者众，农民寡也。其令郡国务劝农桑，益种树，可得衣食物。&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝武外事四夷，内兴功利，役费并兴，而民去本。董仲舒说上曰：&ldquo;春秋它谷不书，至于麦禾不成，则书之，以此见圣人于五谷最重麦与禾也。今关中俗不好种麦，是岁失春秋之所重，而损生民之具也。愿陛下幸诏大司农，使关中民益种宿麦，令毋后时。&rdquo;</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">宿麦，谓苗经冬。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">仲舒又说上曰：&ldquo;秦用商鞅之法，改帝王之制，除井田，民得卖买，富者田连阡陌，贫者无立锥之地。汉兴，循而未改。古井田法虽难卒</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">音猝</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">行，宜少近古，限民名田，以赡不足，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">名田，占田也。各为立限，不使富者过制，则贫弱之家可足也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">塞并兼之路，然后可善治也。&rdquo;竟不能用。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">元狩三年，遣谒者劝有水灾郡种宿麦，举吏人能假贷贫人者以名闻。及末年，帝悔征伐之事，乃封丞相田千秋为富民侯。下诏曰：&ldquo;方今之务，在于力农。&rdquo;以赵过为搜粟都尉。过能为代田，一亩三甽，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">甽，垄也，音工犬反，字或作畎。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">岁代处，故曰代田，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">代，易也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">古法也。后稷始甽田，以二耜为耦，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">并两耜而耕。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">广尺深尺曰甽，长终亩。一亩三甽，一夫三百甽，而播种于甽中。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">播，布也。种谓谷子。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">苗生叶以上，稍耨陇草，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">耨，锄也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">因隤其土以附苗根。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">隤谓下之。音颓。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">故其诗曰：&ldquo;或芸或籽，黍稷儗儗。&rdquo;</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">音拟。小雅甫田之诗。儗儗，盛貌。籽音子。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">芸，除草也。籽，附根也。言苗稍壮，每耨辄附根，比</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">必寐反</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">盛暑，陇尽而根深，能风与旱，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">能读曰耐。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">故儗儗而盛也。其耕耘下种田器，皆有便巧。率十二夫为田一井一屋，故亩五顷，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">九夫为井，三夫为屋。夫百亩，于古为十二顷。古百步为亩，汉时二百四十步为亩，古千二百亩，则得今五顷也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">用耦犁，二牛三人，一岁之收常过缦田亩一斛以上，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">缦田，谓不甽者。音莫干反。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">善者倍之。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">善为甽者，又过缦田二斛以上。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">过使教田太常、三辅，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">太常主诸陵，有民，故亦课田种。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">大农置工巧奴与从事，为作田器。二千石遣令长、三老、力田及里父老善田者受田器，学耕种养苗状。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">为法意状。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">民或苦少牛，无以趋泽，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">趋读曰趣，及也。泽，雨之润泽。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">故平都令光教过以人挽</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">音晚</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">犁。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">挽，引也。史失光姓。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">过奏光以为丞，教民相与庸挽犁。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">庸，功也，言换功共作也。义与佣赁同。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">率多人者田日三十亩，少者十三亩，以故田多垦辟。过试以离宫卒田其宫壖</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">而缘反</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">地，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">离宫，别处之宫，非天子所常居也。壖，馀也。宫壖地，谓外垣之内，内垣之外也。诸缘河壖地，庙垣壖地，其义皆同。守离宫卒，闲而无事，因令于壖地为田。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">课得谷皆多其旁田亩一斛以上。令命家田三辅公田。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">令，使也。命者，教也。令离宫卒教其家田公田也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">又教边郡及居延城。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">居延，张掖县也。时有甲卒也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">是后边城、河东、弘农、三辅、太常民皆便代田，用力少而得谷多。至孝昭时，流民稍还，田野垦辟，颇有畜积。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝宣地节三年，诏曰：&ldquo;郡国宫馆，勿复修治。流民还归者，假公田，贷种食。&rdquo;</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">种，五谷种。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝元初元元年，以三辅、太常、郡国公田及苑可省者振业贫民，江海陂湖园池属少府者以假贫民，勿租赋。建昭五年，诏曰：&ldquo;方春农桑兴，百姓戮力自尽之时也。故是月劳农劝桑，无使后时。今不良之吏，覆按小罪，徵召证按，兴不急之事，以妨百姓，使失一时之作，亡终岁之功，公卿其明察申敕之。&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝成帝之时，张禹占郑白之渠四百馀顷，他人兼并者类此，而人弥困。阳朔四年正月，诏曰：&ldquo;夫洪范八政，以食为首，斯诚家给刑错之本也。先帝劭农，薄其租税，宠其强力，令与孝弟同科。闲者，民弥惰怠，乡本者少，趋末者众，将何以矫之？方东作时，其令二千石勉劝农桑，出入阡陌，致劳来之。书不云乎，&lsquo;服田力啬，乃亦有秋&rsquo;。其勖之哉！&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝哀即位，师丹辅政，建言：&ldquo;古之圣王莫不设井田，然后治乃可平。孝文皇帝承亡周乱秦兵革之后，天下空虚，故务劝农桑，帅以节俭，民始充实，未有并兼之害，故不为民田及奴婢为限。今累世承平，豪富吏民訾数钜万，而贫弱逾困。盖君子为政，贵因循而重改作，所以有改者，将以救急也。亦未可详，宜略为限。&rdquo;天子下其议。丞相孔光、大司空何武奏请：&ldquo;诸侯王、列侯皆得名田国中。列侯在长安，公主名田县道，及关内侯、吏民名田皆毋过三十顷。诸侯王奴婢二百人，列侯、公主百人，关内侯、吏民三十人。期尽三年，犯者没入官。&rdquo;时田宅奴婢贾为减贱，丁、傅用事，董贤隆贵，皆不便也。诏书且须后，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">须，待也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">遂寝不行。孝平元始元年，置大司农部丞十三人，人部一州，劝农桑。二年，定垦田八百二十七万五百三十顷。盖纪汉盛时之数。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">据元始二年户一千二百二十三万三千，每户合得田六十七亩百四十六步有奇。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">王莽篡位，下令曰：&ldquo;古者设井田，则国给人富而颂声作。此唐虞之道，三代所遵行也。秦为无道，坏圣制，废井田，是以兼并起，贪鄙生，强者规田以千数，弱者曾无立锥之居。&rdquo;于是&ldquo;更名天下田曰&lsquo;王田&rsquo;，奴婢曰&lsquo;私属&rsquo;，皆不得买卖。其男口不盈八而田过一井者，分馀田与九族邻里乡党。故无田今当受田者，如制度。敢有非井田圣制、无法惑众者，投诸四裔&rdquo;。于是农商失业，食货俱废，百姓涕泣于市道。坐卖买田宅奴婢，自诸侯卿大夫至于庶人，抵罪者不可胜数。经二年馀，中郎区博谏曰：&ldquo;井田虽圣王法，其废已久。周道既衰，而人不从。秦顺人心，改之可以获大利，故灭庐井而置阡陌，遂王诸夏，讫今海内未厌其弊。今欲违人心，追复千载绝迹，虽尧舜复生，而无百年之渐，不能行也。&rdquo;莽知人愁，乃以许卖。其后百姓日以凋弊。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">后汉之初，百姓虚耗，率土遗黎，十才一二。光武建武十五年，诏下州郡检覆垦田顷亩及户口年纪。河南尹张伋及诸郡守十馀人，坐度田不实下狱死。顺帝建康元年，定垦田六百八十九万六千二百七十一顷五十六亩九十四步。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">据建康元年户九百九十四万六千九百九十，每户合得田七十亩有奇。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">荀悦论曰：&ldquo;昔文帝十三年六月，诏除人田租。且古者十一而税，以为天下之中正。今汉人田，或百一而税，可谓鲜矣。然豪富强人占田逾多，其赋太半，官收百一之税，而人输豪强太半之赋。官家之惠，优于三代，豪强之暴，酷于亡秦，是以惠不下通，而威福分于豪人也。今不正其本，而务除租税，适足以资富强也。孝武皇帝时董仲舒尝言，宜限人占田。至哀帝时，乃限人占田不得过三十顷，虽有其制，卒难施行。然三十顷又不平矣，且夫井田之制，不宜于人众之时，田广人寡，苟为可也。然欲废之于寡，立之于众，土地布列在豪强，卒而革之，并有怨心，则生纷乱，制度难行。由是观之，若高祖初定天下，光武中兴之后，人众稀少，立之易矣。既未悉备井田之法，宜以口数占田为之立限。人得耕种，不得卖买，以赡贫弱，以防兼并，且为制度张本，不亦宜乎！虽古今异制，损益随时，然纪纲大略，其致一也。&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">崔寔政论曰：&ldquo;昔圣人分口耕耦地，各相副适，使人饥饱不变，劳逸齐均。富者不足僭差，贫者无所企慕。始暴秦隳坏法度，制人之财，既无纲纪，而乃尊奖并兼之人。乌氏以牧竖致财，宠比诸侯；寡妇清以攻丹殖业，礼以国宾。于是巧猾之萌，遂肆其意。上家累巨亿之赀，斥地侔封君之土，行苞苴以乱执政，养剑客以威黔首。专杀不辜，号无市死之子。生死之奉，多拟人主。故下户踦岖，无所跱足，乃父子低首，奴事富人，躬帅妻孥，为之服役。故富者席馀而日炽，贫者蹑短而岁踧，历代为虏，犹不赡于衣食，生有终身之勤，死有暴骨之忧，岁小不登，流离沟壑，嫁妻卖子。其所以伤心腐藏、失生人之乐者，盖不可胜陈。故古有移人通财，以赡蒸黎。今青、徐、兖、冀，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">后汉青州，今北海、济南、淄川、东莱、东牟、高密、平原等郡地。徐州，今东海、琅邪、彭城、临淮、广陵等郡地。兖州，今陈留、灵昌、濮阳、东平、济阳、济阴、鲁等郡地。冀州，今魏郡、邺郡、钜鹿、清河、常山、赵郡、博陵、信都、景城等郡地。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">人稠土狭，不足相供。而三辅左右及凉、幽州，内附近郡，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">凉州，今安定、彭原之北、天水、陇西并其地。幽州，今上谷、范阳之北，东至辽东并其地。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">皆土旷人稀，厥田宜稼，悉不垦发。小人之情，安土重迁，宁就饥馁，无适乐土之虑。故人之为言瞑也，谓瞑瞑无所知。犹群羊聚畜，须主者牧养处置，置之茂草，则肥泽繁息，置之硗卤，则零丁耗减。是以景帝六年，下诏郡国，令人得去硗狭，就宽肥。至武帝，遂徙关东贫人于陇西、北地、西河、上郡、会稽，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">陇西，今陇西、天水、金城、会宁、安乡等郡地。北地，今安定、彭原、安化、平原、灵武、五原等郡地。西河，今银川、新秦、西河、昌化等郡地。上郡，今延安、咸宁、洛交、中部等郡地。会稽，今浙江东晋陵郡以东，直至信安、永嘉郡地。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">凡七十二万五千口。后加徙猾吏于关内。今宜复遵故事，徙贫人不能自业者于宽地，此亦开草辟土，振人之术也。&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">仲长统昌言曰：&ldquo;远州县界至数千，而诸夏有十亩共桑之迫。远州有旷野不发之田，代俗安土有死无去。君长不使，谁能自往缘边之地。亦可因罪徙人，便以守御。&rdquo;<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">晋武帝泰始八年，司徒石苞奏：&ldquo;州郡农桑未有殿最之制，宜增掾属令史，有所循行。&rdquo;帝从之。苞既明劝课，百姓安之。平吴之后，有司奏：&ldquo;王公以国为家，京城不宜复有田宅。今未暇作诸国邸，当使城中有往来之处，近郊有刍稿之田。今可限之，国王公侯，京城得有宅一处。近郊田，大国十五顷，次国十顷，小国七顷。城内无宅城外有者，皆听留之。&rdquo;男子一人占田七十亩，女子三十亩。其丁男课田五十亩，丁女二十亩，次丁男半之，女则不课。其官第一品五十顷，每品减五顷以为差，第九品十顷。而又各以品之高卑荫其亲属，多者及九族，少者三代。宗室、国宾、先贤之后士人子孙亦如之。而又得荫人以为衣食客及佃客，量其官品以为差降。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">自西晋则有荫客之制，至东晋其数更加，具赋税上篇。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">宋孝武帝大明初，羊希为尚书左丞。时扬州刺史西阳王子尚上言：&ldquo;山湖之禁，虽有旧科，人俗相因，替而不奉，熂</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">许气反</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">山封水，保为家利。自顷以来，颓弛日甚。富强者兼岭而占，贫弱者薪苏无托。至渔采之地，亦又如兹。斯实害理之深弊。请损益旧条，更申恒制。&rdquo;有司检壬辰诏书：&ldquo;擅占山泽，强盗律论，赃一丈以上皆弃市。&rdquo;希以&ldquo;壬辰之制，其禁严刻，事既难遵，理与时弛。而占山封水，渐染复滋，更相因仍，便成先业，一朝顿去，易致怨嗟。今更刊革，立制五条。凡是山泽，先恒熂郐</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">力居反。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">种养竹木杂果为林仍，及陂湖江海鱼梁怅鮆</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">七由反，即移反。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">场恒加工修作者，听不追夺。官品第一、第二品，听占山三顷。第三、第四品，二顷五十亩。第五、第六品，二顷。第七、第八品，一顷五十亩。第九品及百姓，一顷。皆依定格，条上赀簿。若先已占山，不得更占。先占阙少，依限占足。若非前条旧业，一不得禁。有犯者，水土一尺以上，并计赃，依常盗律论。除晋咸康二年壬辰之科&rdquo;。从之。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">时山阴县人多田少，孔灵符表请徙无赀之家于馀姚、鄮、</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">莫侯反</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">鄞</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">银音</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">三县界，垦起湖田。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">馀姚，今会稽郡县。鄮、鄞则今馀姚郡地。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">帝令公卿博议，咸曰：&ldquo;夫训农修政，有国所同。土著之人，习玩日久，如京师无田，不闻徙居他县。寻山阴豪族富室，顷亩不少，贫者肆力，非为无处。又缘湖居人，鱼鸭为业，小人习始既难，劝之未易。远废之畴，方翦荆棘，率课穷乏，其事弥难，资徙粗立，徐行无晚。&rdquo;帝违众议，徙人并成良业。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">后魏明帝永兴中，频有水旱。神瑞二年，又不熟，于是分简尤贫者就食山东。敕有司劝课田农曰：&ldquo;前志有之，人生在勤，勤则不匮。凡庶人不畜者祭无牲，不耕者祭无盛，不树者死无椁，不蚕者衣无帛，不绩者丧无縗。教行三农，生殖九谷。&rdquo;自是人皆力勤，岁数丰穰，畜牧滋息。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">景穆帝初为太子监国，曾令有司课畿内之人，使无牛家以人牛力相贸，垦殖锄耨。其有牛家与无牛家一人种田二十亩，偿以耘锄功七亩，如是为差。至与老小无牛家种田七亩，老小者偿以锄功二亩。皆以五口下贫家为率。各列家别口数、所种顷亩，明立簿目。所种者于地首标题姓名，以辨播殖之功。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">孝文太和元年三月，诏曰：&ldquo;去年牛疫，死伤太半，今东作既兴，人须肄业。有牛者加勤于常岁，无牛者倍佣于馀年。一夫制理四十亩，中男二十亩。无令人有馀力，地有遗利。&rdquo;时李安世上疏曰：&ldquo;臣闻量地画野，经国大式，邑地相参，致理之本。井税之兴，其来日久，田莱之数，制之以限。盖欲使土不旷功，人罔游力。雄擅之家，不独膏腴之美；单陋之夫，亦有顷亩之分。窃见州郡之人，或因年俭流移，弃卖田宅，漂居异乡，事涉数代。三长既立，始返旧墟，庐井荒凉，桑榆改植。事已历远，易生假冒，强宗豪族，肆其侵淩，远认魏晋之家，近引亲旧之验。年载稍久，乡老所惑，群证虽多，莫可取据。各附亲知，互有长短，两证徒具，听者犹疑，争讼迁延，连纪不判。良畴委而不开，柔桑枯而不采，欲令家丰岁储，人给资用，其可得乎！愚谓今虽桑井难复，宜更均量，审其径术，令分艺有准，力业相称。细人获资生之利，豪右靡馀地之盈。无私之泽，乃播均于兆庶，如阜如山，可有积于比户矣。又所争之田，宜限年断，事久难明，悉属今主。然后虚诈之人，绝于觊觎，守分之士，免于淩夺。&rdquo;帝深纳之，均田之制起于此矣。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">九年，下诏均给天下人田：诸男夫十五以上，受露田四十亩，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">不栽树者谓之露田。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">妇人二十亩，奴婢依良。丁牛一头受田三十亩，限四牛。所授之田率倍之，三易之田再倍之，以供耕休及还受之盈缩。人年及课则受田，老免及身没则还田，奴婢、牛随有无以还受。诸桑田不在还受之限，但通入倍田分。于分虽盈，没则还田，不得以充露田之数，不足者以露田充倍。诸初受田者，男夫一人给田二十亩，课莳馀，种桑五十树，枣五株，榆三根。非桑之土，夫给一亩，依法课莳榆、枣。奴各依良。限三年种毕，不毕，夺其不毕之地。于桑榆地分杂莳馀果及多种桑榆者不禁。诸应还之田，不得种桑榆枣果，种者以违令论，地入还分。诸桑田皆为代业，身终不还，恒从见口。有盈者无受无还，不足者受种如法。盈者得卖其盈，不足者得买所不足。不得卖其分，亦不得买过所足。诸麻布之土，男夫及课，别给麻田十亩，妇人五亩，奴婢依良，皆从还受之法。诸有举户老小残疾无受田者，年十一以上及疾者，各授以半夫田。年逾七十者不还所受。寡妇守志者，虽免课亦授妇田。诸还受人田，恒以正月。若始受田而身亡及卖买奴婢、牛者，皆至明年正月乃得还受。诸土广人稀之处，随力所及，官借人种莳。后有来居者，依法封授。诸地狭之处，有进丁受田而不乐迁者，则以其家桑田为正田分，又不足不给倍田，又不足家内人别减分。无桑之乡，准此为法。乐迁者听逐空荒，不限异州他郡，唯不听避劳就逸。其地足之处，不得无故而移。诸人有新居者，三口给地一亩，以为居室，奴婢五口给一亩。男女十五以上，因其地分，口课种菜五分亩之一。诸一人之分，正从正，倍从倍，不得隔越他畔。进丁受田者，恒从所近。若同时俱受，先贫后富。再倍之田，放此为法。诸远流配谪无子孙及户绝者，墟宅、桑榆尽为公田，以供授受。授受之次，给其所亲，未给之闲，亦借其所亲。诸宰人之官，各随近给公田：刺史十五顷，太守十顷，治中、别驾各八顷，县令、郡丞六顷。更代相付。卖者坐如律。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">职分田起于此。</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span>', '', '', '127.0.0.1'),
(32, 8, '<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 18.6667px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">周易》曰：大哉乾元，万物资始，乃统天，云行雨施，品物流形，大明终始，六位时成，时乘六龙以御天，乾道变化，各正性命。</span><br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 18.6667px; text-size-adjust: auto;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 18.6667px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">又曰：立天之道，曰阴与阳。</span><br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 18.6667px; text-size-adjust: auto;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 18.6667px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">又曰：天行健。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《尚书》曰：乃命羲和，钦若昊天。</span><br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">又曰：皇天震怒，命我文考，肃将天威。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《礼记》曰：天地之道，博也。厚也。高也。明也。悠也。久也。日月星辰系焉。万物覆焉。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《论语》曰：天何言哉。四时行焉。百物生焉。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《老子》曰：天得一以清。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《春秋繁露》曰：天有十端，天地阴阳水土金木火人，凡十端，天亦喜怒之气，哀乐之心，与人相副，以类合之，天人一也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《尔雅》曰：穹苍，苍天也。春为苍天，夏为昊天，秋为旻天，冬为上天。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《春秋元命苞》曰：天不足西北，阳极于九，故天周九九八十一万里。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《浑天仪》曰：天如鸡子，天大地小，天表里有水，地各乘气而立，载水而浮，天转如车毂之运。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《黄帝素问》曰：积阳为天，故天者清阳也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《庄子》曰：天之苍苍，其正色邪，其远而无所至极邪。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《申子》曰：天道无私，是以恒正，天常正，是以清明。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《文子》曰：高莫高于天，下莫下于泽，天高泽下，圣人法之。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《太玄》曰：有九天，一为中天，二为羡天，三为从天，四为更天，五为睟天，六为廓天，七为咸天，八为沈天，九为成天。</span><br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">又曰：天以不见为玄。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《皇览记》曰：好道者，言黄帝乘龙升云，登朝霞，上至列阙，倒影经过天宫。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《礼统》曰：天地者，元气之所生万物之祖也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《广雅》曰：太初，气之始也。清浊未分，太始，形之始也。清者为精，浊者为形，太素，质之始也。已有素朴而未散也。二气相接，剖判分离，轻清者为天。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《吕氏春秋》曰：天有九野，何谓九野，中央曰钧天，东方曰苍天，东北曰变天，北方曰玄天，西北曰幽天，西方曰皓天，西南曰朱天，南方曰炎天，东南曰阳天。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《列子》曰：杞国有人，忧天崩坠，身无所寄，废于寝食，又有忧彼之忧者。晓之曰：天积气耳，无处无气，奈何而崩坠乎。其人曰：天果积气，日月星宿，不当坠也。晓者曰：日月星宿，亦积气中之有光曜者，正复使坠，亦不能有中伤。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《说苑》曰：齐桓公问管仲，王者何所贵。对曰：贵天，桓公仰观天。管仲曰：所谓之天者，非谓苍苍莽莽之天也。君人者以百姓为天。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《白虎通》曰：天者身也。天之为言镇也。居高理下，为人镇也。男女惣名为人，天地所以无惣名何，天圆地方，不相类也。天左旋，地右周，犹君臣阴阳相对向也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">张衡《灵宪》曰：太素之前，幽清寂寞，不可为象，惟虚惟无，盖道之根也。道根既建，由无生有，太素始萌，萌而示兆，斯谓庞洪，盖道之干也。道干既育，万物成体，于是刚柔始分，清浊异位，天成于外而体阳，故圆以动，斯谓天元，道之实也。天有元位。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《徐整三五历纪》曰：天地混沌如鸡子，盘古生其中，万八千岁，天地开辟，阳清为天，阴浊为地，盘古在其中，一日九变，神于天，圣于地，天日高一丈，地日厚一丈，盘古日长一丈，如此万八千岁，天数极高，地数极深，盘古极长，后乃有三皇，数起于一，立于三，成于五，盛于七，处于九，故天去地九万里。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《蜀志》曰：吴使张温来聘。温问秦密曰：天有头乎。密曰：有之。温曰：在何方。密曰：诗云，乃眷西顾，以此推之，头在西方。温曰：天有耳乎。密曰：天处高而听卑，诗云，鹤鸣九皋，声闻于天，若其无耳，何以听之。温曰：天有足乎。密曰：诗云，天步艰难，若其无足，何以步之。温曰：天有姓乎。密曰：姓刘，何以然。曰：其子姓刘，以此知之。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">《楚辞天问》曰：图则九重，孰营度之，八柱何当，东南何亏。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-size: 12pt; color: rgb(0, 136, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">言天有八山为柱，皆何当值，东南不足，谁亏缺之。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">日月安属，列星安陈。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">【诗】《晋传言两仪诗》曰：两仪始分，元气上清，列宿垂象，六位时成，日月西迈，流景东征，悠悠万物，殊品齐名，圣人忧世，实念群生。</span><br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">又《天行篇》曰：天行一何健，日月无高踪，百川赴阳谷，三辰因泰蒙。</span><br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">又歌曰：天时泰兮昭以阳，清风起兮景云翔，仰观兮辰象，日月兮运周，俯视兮河海，百川兮东流。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">【赋】《晋成公绥天地赋》曰：天地至神，难以一言定称，故体而言之，则曰两仪，假而言之，则曰乾坤，气而言之，则曰阴阳，性而言之，则曰柔刚，色而言之，则曰玄黄，名而言之，则曰天地，若乃悬象成文，列宿有章，三辰烛耀，五纬重光，众星回而环极，招摇运而指方，白虎时据于参代，青龙垂尾于氐房，玄龟匿首于女虚，朱鸟奋翼于星张，帝皇正坐于紫宫，辅臣列位于文昌，垣屏络驿而珠连，三台差池而雁行，轩辕华布而曲列，摄提鼎峙而相望。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">【赞】《晋郭璞释天地图赞》曰：祭地肆瘗，郊天致烟，气升太一，精沦九泉，至敬不文，明德惟鲜。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">【表】《宋颜延之请立浑天仪表》曰：张衡创物，蔡邕造论，戎夏相袭，世重其术，臣昔奉使入关，值大军旋旆，浑仪在路，肆观奇秘，绝代异宝，旋及王府，考诸前志，诚应夙闻，尚书，琁玑玉衡，以齐七政，崔瑗所谓数术穷天地，制作侔造化，经志所云，图宪所本，故体度不渝，精测尚矣。则七晷运变，无匪康时，九代贞观，不绝司历，臣夙怀末意，惧于非任，今忝惟职统，敢昧死以闻。</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span>', '', '', '127.0.0.1'),
(33, 8, '<table style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Tahoma; font-size: 14px;\" width=\"100%\">\r\n	<tbody style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n		<tr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n			<td style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\"><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">乾，元亨利贞，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">文言备也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">象曰：天行健，君子以自强不息，九三，君子终日乾乾，夕惕若，厉，无咎，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">处下体之极，居上体之下，纯修下道，则居上之德废；纯修上道，则处下之礼旷，故终日乾乾，至于夕，惕犹若厉也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">九五，飞龙在天，利见大人，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">不行不跃而在乎天，故曰飞龙也。龙德在天，则大人之路亨也。夫位以德兴，德以位叙，以至德而处盛位，万物之睹，不亦宜乎。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">上九，亢龙有悔。彖曰：大哉乾元，万物资始，乃统天，云行雨施，品物流形，大明终始，六位时成，时乘六龙以御天，乾道变化，各正性命，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">大明乎终始之道，故六位不失其时而成也。升降无常，随时而用，处则乘潜龙，出则乘飞龙，故曰&ldquo;时乘六龙&rdquo;也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">保合大和，乃利贞，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">不和而刚暴也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">首出庶物，万国咸宁。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">万国所以甯，各以有君也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">文言曰：元者善之长也。亨者嘉之会也。利者义之和也。贞者事之干也。君子体仁，足以长人，嘉会足以合礼，利物足以和义，贞固足以干事，君子行此四德者。故曰：乾，元亨利贞。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子终日乾乾，夕惕若，厉，无咎。何谓也？子曰：君子进德修业，忠信，所以进德也。修辞立其诚，所以居业也。是故居上位而不骄，在下位而不忧，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">居下体之上，在上体之下，明夫终敝，故不骄也。知夫至至，故不忧也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">故乾乾因其时而惕，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">惕，怵惕之谓也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">虽危无咎矣飞龙在天，利见大人。何谓也？子曰：同声相应，同气相求，水流湿，火就燥，云从龙，风从虎，圣人作而万物睹，亢龙有悔。何谓也？子曰：贵而无位，高而无民，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">下无阴也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">贤人在下位而无辅，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">贤人虽在下，而当位，不为之助。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">是以动而有悔也。君子学以聚之，问以辨之，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">以君德而处下体，资纳于物者也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">宽以居之，仁以行之，夫大人者，与天地合其德，与日月合其明，与四时合其序，与鬼神合其吉凶，先天而天弗违，后天而奉天时，天且弗违，而况于人乎。况于鬼神乎。亢之为言也。知进而不知退，知存而不知亡，知得而不知丧，其唯圣人乎。知进退存亡而不失其正者，其唯圣人乎。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">坤。象曰：地势坤，君子以厚德载物。彖曰：至哉坤元，万物资生，乃顺承天，坤厚载物，德合无疆，含弘光大，品物咸亨。文言曰：坤至柔而动也刚，至静而德方，含万物而化光，坤道其顺乎。承天而时行，积善之家，必有馀庆，积不善之家，必有馀殃，君子敬以直内，义以方外，敬义立而德不孤。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">屯。象曰：云雷屯，君子以经纶，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子经纶之时。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：天造草昧，宜建侯而不宁。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">屯体不甯，故利建诸侯也。屯者，天地造始之时也。造物之始，始于冥昧，故曰&ldquo;草昧&rdquo;也。处造始之时，所宜之善，莫善于建侯。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">蒙。象曰：山下出泉，蒙，君子以果行育德。彖曰：匪我求童蒙，童蒙求我，志应也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">我谓非童蒙者，暗者求明者，明者不咨暗，故蒙之为义，匪我求童蒙，童蒙求我也。童蒙之来求，我志应故也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">蒙以养正，圣功也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">师。象曰：地中有水，师，君子以容民畜衆，初六，师出以律，否臧凶，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">为师之始，齐师者也。失令有功，法所不赦，故师出不以律，否臧皆凶也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">上六，大君有命，开国承家，小人勿用，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">处师之极，师之终也。大君之命，不失功也。开国承家，以甯邦也。小人勿用，非其道也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">象曰：大君有命，以正功也。小人勿用，必乱邦也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">比。象曰：地上有水，比，先王以建万国，亲诸侯。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">万国以比建，诸侯以比亲。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">履。象曰：上天下泽，履，君子以辩上下，定民志。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">泰。象曰：天地交，泰，后以财成天地之道，辅相天地之宜，以左右民，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">上下大通，则物失其节，故财成而辅相，以左右民也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：天地交而万物通也。上下交而其志同也。内君子而外小人，君子道长，小人道消也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">否。象曰：天地不交，否，君子以俭德避难，不可荣以禄。彖曰：天地不交而万物不通，上下不交而天下无邦也。内阴而外阳，内柔而外刚，内小人而外君子，小人道长，君子道消也。九五，休否，大人吉，其亡其亡，系于苞桑，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">居否之世，能全其身者，唯大人耳，巽为木，木莫善于桑，人虽欲有亡之者，衆根坚固，弗能拔之也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">同人。象曰：天与火，同人，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">天体于上，而火炎上，同人之义。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子以类族辩物，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子小人，各得所同。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：文明以健，中正而应，君子正也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">行健不以武，而以文明用之，相应不以邪，而以中正应之，君子正也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">唯君子为能通天下之志。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子以文明为德者也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">大有。象曰：火在天上，大有，君子以遏恶扬善，顺天休命，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">大有，包容之象也。故遏恶扬善，成物之美，顺奉天德，休物之命也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：柔得尊位，大中，而上下应之，曰大有，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">处尊以柔，居中以大，上下应之，靡所不纳，大有之义也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">其德刚健而文明，应乎天而时行，是以元亨，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">德应于天，则行不失时矣。则健不滞，文明不犯，应天则大，时行无违，是以元亨也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">上九，自天佑之，吉无不利。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">居大有之上，而不累于位，志尚于贤者也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">谦。象曰：地中有山，谦，君子以裒多益寡，称物平施，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">多者用谦以为裒，少者用谦以为益，随物而与，施不失平也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：谦，亨，天道下济而光明，地道卑而上行，天道亏盈而益谦，地道变盈而流谦，鬼神害盈而福谦，人道恶盈而好谦，谦，尊而光，卑而不可逾，君子之终也。初六，谦谦君子，用涉大川，吉，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">能体谦谦，其唯君子，用涉大难，物无害也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">象曰：谦谦君子，卑以自牧也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">牧，养也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">九三，劳谦，君子有终，吉，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">劳谦匪懈，是以吉也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">象曰：劳谦君子，万民服也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">豫。象曰：雷出地奋，豫。彖曰：豫，顺以动，故天地如之，天地以顺动，故日月不过而四时不忒，圣人以顺动，则刑罚清而民服，豫之时义大矣哉。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">随。象曰：泽中有雷，随，君子以向晦入宴息，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">泽中有雷，动悦之象也。物皆悦随，可以无为，不劳明监，故君子向晦人宴息也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：随时之义大矣哉。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">得时则天下随之矣。随之所施，唯在于时，时异而不随，否之道也。故随时之义大矣哉。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">观。象曰：风行地上，观，先王以省方，观民设教。彖曰：顺而巽，中正以观天下，观天之神道，而四时不忒，圣人以神道设教，而天下服，六四，观国之光，利用宾于王，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">居观之时，最近至尊，观国之光者也。居近得位，明习国仪者也。故曰，利用宾于王也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">九五，观我生，君子无咎。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">上之化下，犹风靡草，故观民之俗，以察己道，百姓有罪，在余一人，君子风著，己乃无咎，上为化主，将欲自观，乃观民也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">噬嗑。象曰：雷电噬嗑，先王以明罚敕法，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment1\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">本书整作敕。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：刚柔分，动而明，雷电合而彰，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">刚柔分动，不溷乃明，雷电并合，不乱乃章，皆利用狱之义也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">贲，象曰：山下有火，贲，君子以明庶政，无敢折狱，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">处贲之时，止物以文明，不可以威刑，故君子以明庶政，而无敢折狱也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：观乎天文，以察时变，观乎人文，以化成天下，六五，贲于丘园，束帛戋戋，吝，终吉。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">为饰之主，饰之盛者也。饰于物，其道害矣。施饰丘园，盛莫大焉。故曰贲于丘园，束帛乃戋戋，用莫过俭，泰而能约，故必吝焉。乃得终吉也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">大畜。象曰：天在山中，大畜，君子以多识前言往行，以畜其德，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">物之可畜于怀，令德不散，尽于此也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：大畜，刚健笃实，晖光日新其德。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">凡物能晖光曰新其德者，唯刚健笃实者也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">颐。象曰：山下有雷，颐，君子以慎言语，节饮食，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">言语饮食，犹慎而节之，而况其馀乎。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：颐，贞吉，养正则吉也。天地养万物，圣人养贤以及万民，颐之时大矣哉。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">习坎。象曰：水洊至，习坎，君子以常德行，习教事，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">至险未夷，教不可废，故以常德行而习教事也。习于坎，然后能不以难为困，而德行不失常。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：习坎，重险也。天险不可升也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">不可得升，故得保其威尊。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">地险，山川丘陵也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">有山川，故物得保以全也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">王公设险以守其国，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">国之为卫，恃于险也。言白天，地以下，莫不须险也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">险之时用大矣哉。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">非用之常，用有时也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">离。象曰：明两作，离，大人以继明，照于四方，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">继，谓不绝。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：离，丽也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">丽犹著也。各得所著之宜者也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">日月丽乎天，百谷草木丽，乎土，重明以丽乎正，乃化成天下。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">咸。象曰：山上有泽，咸，君子以虚受人，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">以虚受人，物乃感应也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：咸，感也。柔上而刚下，二气感应以相与，天地感而万物化生，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">二气相与，乃化生也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">圣人感人心而天下和平，观其所感，而天地万物之情可见矣。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">天地万物之情，见于所感也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">恒。象曰：雷风，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">恒，长阳长阴，合而相与，可久之道也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子以立不易方，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">得其所久，故不易也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：天地之道，恒久而不已也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">得其所久，故不已也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">日月得天而能久照，四时变化而能久成，圣人久于其道而天下化成，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">言各得所恒，故皆能久长也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">观其所恒，而天地万物之情可见矣。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">天地万物之情，见于所恒也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">九三，不恒其德，或承之羞，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">德行无恒，自相违错，不可致诘，故或承之羞也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">不恒其德，无所容也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">遯。象曰：天下有山，遯，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">天下有山，阴长之象也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子以远小人，不恶而严，九五，嘉遯，贞吉，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">遯而得正，反制于内，小人应命，率正<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				其志，不恶而严，得正之吉，遯之嘉者也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">象曰：嘉遯贞吉，以正志也。上九，肥遯，无不利，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">最处外极，无应于内，超然绝志，心无疑顾，忧患不能累，矰缴不能及，是以肥遯无不利也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">象曰：肥遯无不利，无所疑也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">大壮。象曰：雷在天上，大壮，君子以非礼弗履，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">壮而违礼则凶，凶则失壮矣。故君子以大壮而顺礼也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：大壮利贞，大者正也。正大而天地之情可见矣。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">天地之情，正大而已，弘正极大，则天地之情可见矣。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">晋。象曰：明出地上，晋，君子以自昭明德。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">以顺著明，自显之道。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">明夷。象曰：明入地中，明夷，君子以莅衆，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">莅衆显明，蔽僞百姓者也。故以蒙养正，以明夷莅衆矣。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">用晦而明，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">藏明于内，乃得明也。显明于外，乃所避也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：内文明而外柔顺，以蒙大难，文王以之，利艰贞，晦其明也。内难而能正其志，箕子以之。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">家人。象曰：风自火出，家人，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">由内相成，炽也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">君子以言有物而行有恒，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">家人之道，修于近小而不妄者也。故君子言必有物，而口无择言，行必有恒，而身无择行也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：家人，女正位乎内，男正位乎外，天地之大义也。家人有严君焉。父母之谓也。父父，子子，兄兄，弟弟，夫夫，妇妇，而家道正，正家而天下定矣。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">睽。象曰：上火下泽，睽，君子以同而异，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">同于通理，异于职事。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：睽，火动而上，泽动而下，天地睽而其事同也。男女睽而其志通也。万物睽而其事类也。睽之时用大矣哉。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">睽离之时，非小人之所能用也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">蹇。象曰：山上有水，蹇，君子以反身修德，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">除难莫若反身修德也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">彖曰：蹇，难也。险在前也。见险而能止，知矣哉。六二，王臣蹇蹇，匪躬之故，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">处难之时，履当其位，执心不回，志匡王室者也。故曰：王臣蹇蹇，匪躬之故也。履中行义，以存其上，处蹇以此，未见其尤也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">象曰：王臣蹇蹇，终无尤也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">解。象曰：雷雨作，解，君子以赦过宥罪。彖曰：天地解而雷雨作，雷雨作而百果草木皆甲坼，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">天地否结，则雷雨不作，交通感散，雷雨乃作也<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				。雷雨之作，则险厄者亨，否结者散，故百果草木皆甲坼也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">解之时大矣哉。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">无所而不释也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">六三，负且乘，致寇至，贞</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></td>\r\n		</tr>\r\n	</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<br />\r\n', '', '', '127.0.0.1'),
(34, 8, '<table style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Tahoma; font-size: 14px;\" width=\"100%\">\r\n	<tbody style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n		<tr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n			<td style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\"><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">关雎，后妃之德也。风之始也。所以风天下而正夫妇也。故用之鄕人焉。用之邦国焉。风，讽也。教也。风以动之，教以化之，诗者，志之所之也。在心为志，发言为诗，情动于衷而形于言，言之不足，故嗟欢之，嗟欢之不足，故咏歌之，咏歌之不足，不知手之舞之，足之蹈之也。情发于声，声成文谓之音，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">发，犹见也。声，谓宫商角徵羽，声成文者，宫商上下相应也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">治世之音安以乐，其政和，乱世之音怨以怒，其政乖，亡国之音哀以思，其民困，故正得失，动天地，感鬼神，莫近于诗，先王以是经夫妇，成孝敬，厚人伦，美教化，移风易俗，故诗有六义焉。一曰风，二曰赋，三曰比，四曰兴，五曰雅，六曰颂，上以风化下，下以风刺上，言之者无罪，闻之者足以自诫，故曰风，以一国之事，系一人之本，谓之风，言天下之事，形四方之风，谓之雅，雅者正也。言王政之所由废兴也。政有小大，故有小雅焉。有大雅焉。颂者，美盛德之形容，以其成功吿于神明者也。是谓四始，诗之至也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">始者，王道兴衰之所由也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">至于王道衰，礼义废，政教失，国异政，家殊俗，而变风变雅作矣。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment1\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">以一至至也。本书在变雅作矣下，</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">周南邵南，正始之道，王化之基，是以关雎乐得淑女以配君子，忧在进贤，不婬其色，哀窈窕，思贤才，而无伤善之心焉。是关雎之义也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">关关雎鸠，在河之洲，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">兴也。关关，和声也。雎鸠，王雎也。鸟挚而有别，后妃悦乐君子之德，无不和谐，又不淫其色，若雎鸠之有别焉。然后可以风化天下，夫妇有别，则父子亲，父子亲则君臣敬，君臣敬则朝廷正，朝廷正则王化成也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">窈窕淑女，君子好仇，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">窈窕，幽闲也。淑，善也。仇，逑也。后妃有关雎之德，是幽闲贞专之善女，宜为君子仇，逑也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">参差荇菜，左右流之，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">荇，接荼也。流，求也。后妃有关雎之德，乃能供荇菜，备庶物，以事宗庙也。左右助之，言三夫人九嫔以下，皆乐后妃之事也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">窈窕淑女，寤寐求之，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">寤，觉也。寐，寝也。言后妃觉寐则常求此贤女，欲与之共己职。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">求之不得，寤寐思服，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">服，事也。求贤女而不得，觉寐则思己职事，当与谁共之也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">悠哉悠哉。展转反侧。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">悠，思也。言己诚思之也。卧而不周曰展也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">卷耳，后妃之志也。又当辅佐君子，求贤审官，知臣下之勤劳，内有进贤之志，而无险诐私谒之心，朝夕思念，至于忧勤。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">谒，请也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">采采卷耳，不盈倾筐，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">忧者之兴也。采采，事采之也。卷耳，苓耳也。倾筐，畚属也。易盈之器也。器之易盈而不盈者，志在辅佐君子，忧思深也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">嗟我怀人</span></span></span></span></span></span></td>\r\n		</tr>\r\n	</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<br />\r\n', '', '', '127.0.0.1'),
(35, 8, '<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">甘棠，美邵伯也。邵伯之教，明于南国。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">邵伯，姬姓，名奭，作上公，为二伯。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">蔽芾甘棠，勿翦勿伐，邵伯所茇。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">蔽芾，小貌，甘棠，杜也。茇，草舍也。邵伯听男女之讼，不重烦劳百姓，止舍小棠之下而听断焉。国人被其德，悦其化，敬其树也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">何彼秾矣。美王姬也。虽则王姬，亦下嫁于诸侯，车服不系其夫，下王后一等，犹执妇道以成肃雍之德。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">何彼秾矣。唐棣之华，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">兴也。秾，犹戎戎也。唐棣，栘也。云何乎彼戎戎者，乃栘之华，兴者，喻王姬颜色之美盛也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">曷弗肃雍，王姬之车。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">肃，敬也。雍，和也。曷，何也。之，往也。何不敬和乎。王姬往乘车，言其嫁时始乘车则已敬和矣。</span></span></span></span>', '', '', '127.0.0.1'),
(36, 8, '<table style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Tahoma; font-size: 14px;\" width=\"100%\">\r\n	<tbody style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n		<tr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n			<td style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\"><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; text-size-adjust: auto;\">柏舟，言仁而不遇也。衞顷公时，仁人不遇，小人在侧。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">泛彼栢舟，亦泛其流，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">兴也。泛泛，流貌也。柏木所以宜为舟也。泛其流，不以济渡也。舟，载渡物也。今不用而与衆物泛泛然俱流水中，兴者，喻仁人之不用，与羣小人并列，亦犹是也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">耿耿不寐，如有隐忧，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">耿耿，犹儆儆也。隐，痛也。仁人既不遇，忧在见侵害也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\"><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\">&nbsp;</span>忧心悄悄，愠于羣小，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">悄悄，忧貌也。愠，怒也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">觏闵既多，受侮不少。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">闵，病也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">谷风，刺夫妇失道也。衞人化其上，淫于新婚，而弃其旧室，夫妇离绝，国俗伤败焉。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">习习谷风，以阴以雨，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">兴也。习习，和舒之貌，东风言之谷风，阴阳和而谷风至，夫妇和则室家成也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">黾勉同心，不宜有怒，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">言黾勉思与君子同心也。所以黾勉者，以为见谴怒非夫妇之宜也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">采葑采菲，无以下体，</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">葑，蕦也。菲，芴也。下体，根茎也。二菜皆上下可食，然而其根有美时，有恶时，采之者不可以根恶之时，并弃其叶，喻夫妇以礼义合，以颜色亲，亦不可以颜色衰而弃其相与之礼。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">德音莫违，及尔同死。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">莫，无也。及，与也。夫妇之言，无相违者，则可长相与处至死，颜色，斯须之有也。</span></span></span></span></span></span></td>\r\n		</tr>\r\n	</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<br />\r\n', '', '', '127.0.0.1'),
(37, 8, '<span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">相鼠，刺无礼也。衞文公能正其羣臣，而刺在位承先君之化无礼仪也。</span><br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">相，视也。仪，威仪也。视鼠有皮，虽居高显之处，偷食苟得，不知廉耻，亦与人无威仪者同也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto;\">人以有威仪为贵，今反无之，伤化败俗，不如其死无所害也。</span><span style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, times, &quot;Heiti TC&quot;, PMingLiU, PMingLiu-ExtB, SimSun, SimSun-ExtB, HanaMinA, HanaMinB; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">干旄，美好善也。衞文公之臣子多好善，贤者乐告以善道也。</span><span class=\"inlinecomment\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;\">贤者，时处士也。<br style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px;\" />\r\n<br style=\"padding: 0px;
